Books.description:
The damned thing
   The empty house
   A ghost
   The Consequences
   An Old Woman's tale
   How it Happened
   The Shell of sense
   The Secret of the growing gold
   The signal-man
   Ligeia
   The Fullness of life
   Playing with fire
   Narrative of the ghost of the hand
   The Facts in the case of M. Valdemar
   My Platonic sweetheart
   The Bold Dragoon, or The Adventure of my grandfather.
Books.title: Great Classic Ghost Stories
Books.author: Ambrose Bierce

Books.description: Kyle Barnes has been plagued by demonic possession all his life and now he needs answers. Unfortunately, what he uncovers along the way could bring about the end of life on Earth as we know it.
Books.title: Outcast
Books.author: Robert Kirkman
Reader's Digest
Books.description: Reports facts and the most recent theories dealing with ancient civilizations, archaeological discoveries, unexplained catastrophes, and other mysteries from man's past, illustrating accounts with hundreds of photographs, paintings, and maps.
Books.title: The World's Last Mysteries

Books.author: Robert Kirkman
Books.description: Collecting the formative issues in the grown of Invincible as a superhero. This volume collects Invincible's violent battle with the villainous Angstrom Levy, his reunion with his estranged father and the bloody battle with the Viltrumites. This is a can't-miss for any Invincible fan and a perfect addition to any bookshelf.
Books.title: Invincible - Ultimate Collection, Vol. 3
